summary: Farmers will buy more than their usual one or two crops.  This will save you from running all over Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Farmers Buy More Crops
by mdczer

----------
Update
----------

Farmers will now buy chicken eggs also.  

I reconfigured the dialogue to be less cluttered.  (See New Pictures)

--------------------------------


Have you ever been role playing and had the displeasure of a farmer only buying 

your wheat, when you also had gourds you wanted to sell?  Instead you would have 

to seek out farmers all across Skyrim to find a farmer who would buy those 

gourds.  And by that time, you had picked up some more wheat, only to find that 

farmer doesn\'t buy wheat...  Well, your problem is solved.


-----------
Description
-----------

This mod enables the vanilla farmers, that would buy one or two crops, to buy 

all the \"normal\" items.  
*Except Nirnroot, Avrusa is still the only one who will buy those.  (Tried to 

Keep it somewhat lore friendly.)

The farmers will buy all of the usual:

Wheat
Potatoes
Leeks
Gourds
Cabbage


Now, they will also purchase any of the following items you have:

Carrots
Green Apples
Red Apples
Tomatoes
Chicken Eggs





-------------
Compatibility
-------------

This mod alters the \"FavorJobsGatherWheatScript.psc\" script, so make a back up 

of the original.  It\'s in the Data\\Scripts\\Source folder.

This mod also alters the following farmer NPCs:

Synda Llanith
Addvild
Avrusa Sarethi
Azzada Lylvieve
Tulvur
Belyn Hlaalu
Bolfrida
Alfhild BattleBorn
Boti
Lemkil
Reldith
Mathies
Vigdis
Katla
Severio Pelagio


Obviously, if you have any other mod the alters any of the above, there may be 

problems with this mod.



----------
Installing
----------

BE SURE TO MAKE A BACK UP OF THE \"FavorJobsGatherWheatScript.psc\" SCRIPT FIRST.

I recommend using the \"Download with Manager\" button.  You can also download 

manually and copy the files to their appropriate place.




If you find any problems, PM me or leave a comment.

-------
Testing
-------

While testing this MOD, I ran into the problem where new dialogue didn\'t show 

up.  The usual save, close the game, and restart fixed that.  

I tested every farmer, but may have missed something.  If so, let me know.

If you have several different types of the items they buy, it will clutter their list of dialogue options.  (See pictures)
author: mdczer
